title: QB Rumor Mill and What We Learned From the 2020 Season
description:
Kevin and Nora are joined by The Ringer’s Danny Kelly to discuss trade rumors swirling around quarterbacks like Russell Wilson and Carson Wentz (5:35). Then Ryan Shazier joins the show, and he and Kevin and Nora share three things they learned during the 2020 NFL season (36:16). Lastly Las Vegas Raiders receiver Henry Ruggs talks with Kevin and The Ringer's Kaelen Jones about his rookie season and how the Raiders can improve (1:35:45).

Hosts: Kevin Clark and Nora Princiotti
Guests: Danny Kelly, Ryan Shazier, Kaelen Jones, Henry Ruggs
